dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Miliaria germania communia." Shows Nova Scotia south to Cape Fear. Text on verso: Belgica Nova, et Nova Anglia. No signature. Catchword: flumi-. Probably issued in: Atlas contractus, sive, Atlantis majoris compendium ... / Jo. Janssonius. Amstelodami : apud Joannis Joanssonii p.m. Haeredes, anno 1666. Historic Maps copy 1 is uncolored.
